examples.sentence: 让她感到自豪的是，一些雕塑甚至得以重新展出，尽管有时需要置于保护罩之下。
examples.englishTranslation: She is proud that several sculptures have even gone on display again, albeit sometimes beneath protective cases.

examples.sentence: 幽默是比暴力更有效的防御武器。
examples.englishTranslation: Humour is a more effective defence than violence.

examples.sentence: 相平行的线不管延伸多长，永远都不会相交。
examples.englishTranslation: Parallel lines will never meet, no matter how far they go on for.

examples.sentence: 在秋天，总会有摘水果的活动。
examples.englishTranslation: There are always fruit picking activities in autumn.

examples.sentence: 他们攀登得越高，空气就变得越凉爽。
examples.englishTranslation: As they climbed higher, the air became cooler.

definition: to line with; to place something underneath

examples.sentence: 我们得找个合适的镜框把这幅画衬得更加好看。
examples.englishTranslation: We must get the right kind of frame to elevate the picture.

examples.sentence: 导游引导我们游览了古城遗迹。
examples.englishTranslation: The tour guide brought us around the ruins of the ancient city.

examples.sentence: 我们要把这事的罪魁祸首揪出来。
examples.englishTranslation: We need to catch the chief culprit of this situation.

examples.sentence: 一支乱扔的烟被指为引起这场火灾的罪魁祸首。
examples.englishTranslation: A dropped cigarette is the most likely suspect for causing the fire.

examples.sentence: 她眼神恍惚，显然心里在想着别的什么事儿。
examples.englishTranslation: There was a distant look in her eyes; her mind was obviously on something else.

examples.sentence: 委员会下个月将汇报他们的研究情况。
examples.englishTranslation: The committee will report on its research next month.

examples.sentence: 这些法律允许安全部队继续肆意践踏这些人的人权。
examples.englishTranslation: These laws allow the security forces to continue to step on human rights.

examples.sentence: 他们竟然卑鄙到进行人身侮辱的地步。
examples.englishTranslation: They descended to the level of personal insults.

examples.sentence: 他声称自己是一场使用卑鄙手段竞选的受害者。
examples.englishTranslation: He claimed he was the victim of a dirty tricks campaign.

definition: rules of a community or organization

examples.sentence: 损坏了东西要照赔，是老规矩。
examples.englishTranslation: Paying compensation for damages is an accepted practice.

examples.sentence: 他擅长书法，以草书见功。
examples.englishTranslation: He is skilled at calligraphy, especially in cursive.

examples.sentence: 他一瞬间就做完了功课。
examples.englishTranslation: He finished his homework in a flash.

examples.sentence: 她什么都没说，免得按捺不住情绪。
examples.englishTranslation: She said nothing in case she lost her temper.

examples.sentence: 情况越来越糟，给养也快耗尽了。
examples.englishTranslation: Conditions are getting worse and supplies are running out.

examples.sentence: 时间很急促，不要再犹豫了。
examples.englishTranslation: Time is running out, don't hesitate any longer.

examples.sentence: 猎人循着动物的脚印追了几个小时。
examples.englishTranslation: The hunters followed the tracks of the animal for hours.

examples.sentence: 他消失了，未留下任何的踪迹。
examples.englishTranslation: He disappeared without a trace.

examples.sentence: 她无法忍受他唐突无礼的作风。
examples.englishTranslation: She couldn't stand his blunt, graceless manner.

examples.sentence: 他们终于从愚昧无知的束缚中解脱出来。
examples.englishTranslation: They were at last freed from the fetters of ignorance.

examples.sentence: 我不想受按钟点回家的束缚。
examples.englishTranslation: I don't want to be forced to come home at a particular time.

examples.sentence: 该市位居南北交通的枢纽，为各种重要物资的集散地。
examples.englishTranslation: This city, which is situated as the transportation hub between the north and the south, is a distribution centre for all kinds of important goods and materials

examples.sentence: 别为这些事发愁，它会自行解决的。
examples.englishTranslation: Don't worry about these things, they will be resolved on their own.

examples.sentence: 阻挠两国关系正常化
examples.englishTranslation: Stand in the way of normalizing relations between two countries

examples.sentence: 突然一个声音喊道：“回头，回头，美丽的少女，不要在这个凶手的巢穴里逗留。”
examples.englishTranslation: Suddenly a voice cried: "Turn back, turn back, young maiden fair, Linger not in this murderers' lair."

examples.sentence: 关键是要编织有关的个人轶事到你的写作中。
examples.englishTranslation: The key is to weave relevant personal anecdotes into your writing.

examples.sentence: 搬家的那一天，凑巧赶上下雨。
examples.englishTranslation: As luck would have it, we encountered rain on the day we were moving.

examples.sentence: 有人偏离这些，反去讲虚浮的话。
examples.englishTranslation: Some have wandered away from these and turned to meaningless talk.

examples.sentence: 这本书需要全神贯注才能读懂。
examples.englishTranslation: This book requires a great deal of concentration.

examples.sentence: 我全神贯注在看书，没听到你敲门。
examples.englishTranslation: I was so immersed in my book that I didn't hear you knock.

examples.sentence: 截至目前为止，警方并未对他们的挑衅作出反应。
examples.englishTranslation: So far, the police have refused to respond to their provocations.

examples.sentence: 一分钟后他告辞了，离开了房间。
examples.englishTranslation: A minute later he excused himself and left the room.

examples.sentence: 他礼貌地告辞后，便上楼去了自己的房间。
examples.englishTranslation: He excused himself and went up to his room.

examples.sentence: 一切污蔑不实之词都应该推到！
examples.englishTranslation: We should invalidate all slander and libel!

examples.sentence: 她从不因私事而耽误工作
examples.englishTranslation: She never allows her personal problems to interfere with her work

examples.sentence: 他有集邮的癖好。
examples.englishTranslation: He has a hobby of collecting stamps.

examples.sentence: 她的性格沉静，无法揣测她的心事。
examples.englishTranslation: She's a very hard to read person, it is impossible to figure out what she's thinking.

examples.sentence: 别看他现在这么嚣张，蹦跶不了几天了。
examples.englishTranslation: He might seem arrogant now, but his days are numbered.

examples.sentence: 我们一出来，他就变得很跋扈，开始支使我。
examples.englishTranslation: When we're out, he gets really bossy and starts ordering me around.

examples.sentence: 他那时肆无忌惮地在监狱里经营着每个月$400,000的毒品交易。
examples.englishTranslation: While in prison, he was brazenly running a $400,000 a month drug operation.

examples.sentence: 我感到自己成了他们的累赘，真是不好意思。
examples.englishTranslation: I felt myself becoming a hindrance to them, it really was embarrassing.

examples.sentence: 马格达莱娜觉得过去了的就是无用的累赘。
examples.englishTranslation: Magdalena considered the past an irrelevant encumbrance.

examples.sentence: 他站在一旁愣神儿，不知道想写什么。
examples.englishTranslation: He stood by the side in a daze, lost in thought.

examples.sentence: 她非但没帮上忙，反而碍事。
examples.englishTranslation: She was more of a hindrance than a help.

examples.sentence: 新法律会使家庭经济宽裕一些。
examples.englishTranslation: Families will be better off financially under the new law.

definition: let the cat out of the bag

examples.sentence: 我们打算在愚人节那天捉弄他一番，但山姆露馅了。
examples.englishTranslation: We planned to play a trick on him on April Fool's Day, but Sam gave the game away.

examples.sentence: 这是一个值得努力把握的契机。
examples.englishTranslation: This is an opportunity that bodes hard work to grasp.

examples.sentence: 有一两家公司顶住了经济滑坡的势头。
examples.englishTranslation: One or two companies have managed to buck the trend of the recession.

examples.sentence: 没人相信驻扎在边境的士兵们会真的开火。
examples.englishTranslation: No one believed the soldiers stationed at the border would actually open fire.

examples.sentence: 他郑重其事地感谢了她。
examples.englishTranslation: He thanked her earnestly.

definition: remain happily married to a ripe old age

examples.sentence: 婚礼上，新娘和新郎表示要互敬互爱，白头偕老。
examples.englishTranslation: At the wedding party, the bride and the bridegroom expressed that they would live in harmony and mutual respect and grow old together.

definition: be all the rage at the moment; flourished

examples.sentence: 这座书院在南宋的时候可是盛极一时。
examples.englishTranslation: This academy had its heyday in the Southern Song Dynasty.

examples.sentence: 在书店稀缺时，书友会盛极一时，会员数不胜数。
examples.englishTranslation: Book clubs thrived when book stores were scarce, and they once enjoyed huge memberships.

examples.sentence: 如今有太多的人在角逐寥寥无几的工作职位。
examples.englishTranslation: Nowadays, there are too many people competing for too few jobs.

examples.sentence: 当然他们拥有强壮的心智，大胆且狡诈，并能依势获益。
examples.englishTranslation: They had, of course, the strength of mind, as well as the audacity and cunning, to take advantage of this situation.

examples.sentence: 她不幸的童年留下了不可磨灭的痕迹。
examples.englishTranslation: Her unfortunate childhood left an indelible mark.

examples.sentence: 我们因古怪、新颖而获得了声誉。
examples.englishTranslation: Our prestige is due to our quirkiness and novelty.

examples.sentence: 我非但读过此书，还记得所读的内容。
examples.englishTranslation: I've not only read this book before, but I even remember its entire contents.

examples.sentence: 除非发生奇迹，否则我们输定了。
examples.englishTranslation: Unless a miracle happens, we're sure to lose.

examples.sentence: 最多能有4个人可以在虚拟世界中扮演角色进行角逐。
examples.englishTranslation: Up to four players can compete in a virtual world of role playing.

examples.sentence: 你不必在一个伟大城市终老就可撷取其精华。
examples.englishTranslation: You don't need to live your whole life in a great city to attain glory.

examples.sentence: 这部书时而妙趣横生，时而悲悲戚戚。
examples.englishTranslation: This book is sometimes witty and clever, and also sometimes sad.

examples.sentence: 1912年增加了女子项目，现代奥林匹克运动会开始初具雏形。
examples.englishTranslation: In 1912 women's events were added, and the modern Olympic programme began to take shape.

examples.sentence: 柯林摆出他最喜欢的威严架势，对别人的观点十分冷漠。
examples.englishTranslation: Colin put on his favorite air of dignified indifference to opinion.

examples.sentence: 他们私通纯粹是受淫欲的驱使。
examples.englishTranslation: Their affair was purely driven by lust.

examples.sentence: 他的情绪不像平时那么诙谐了。
examples.englishTranslation: He was in a less humourous mood than usual.

examples.sentence: 他当时是英俊潇洒的空军飞行员的典范。
examples.englishTranslation: He was the stereotypical model of a dashing air pilot.

examples.sentence: 他英俊的侧面轮廓转离了我们。
examples.englishTranslation: His handsome profile was turned away from us.

examples.sentence: 他不是她想象中的那种美德典范。
examples.englishTranslation: He wasn't the paragon of virtue she had expected.

examples.sentence: 麦克既固执又刚愎自用，脾气还很坏。
examples.englishTranslation: Mick is not only headstrong and stubborn, he also has a bad temper.

examples.sentence: 真正需要担心的是奥班先生刚愎自用，结党营私的习性。
examples.englishTranslation: The real worry is over Mr Orban's headstrong ways and cliquish habits.

examples.sentence: 拒绝这样一个慷慨的提议未免失礼。
examples.englishTranslation: It would be rude to refuse such a generous offer.

examples.sentence: 人人都佩服她的耐心和永不衰减的好脾气。
examples.englishTranslation: Everyone admired her patience and unfailing good humour.

examples.sentence: 机缘凑巧，我找到一份工作。
examples.englishTranslation: As luck would have it, I found a job.

examples.sentence: 对名望的追求让我们过诗人清心寡欲的生活。
examples.englishTranslation: Fame spurs us the pursue the simple life of a poet.

examples.sentence: 互致寒暄之后，他们便开始严肃的讨论了。
examples.englishTranslation: After exchanging some pleasantries, they began to discuss serious matters.

examples.sentence: 他还要去我们在南卡罗来那的家里看看，我们还一起去瞻仰了我父亲的墓碑。
examples.englishTranslation: He wanted to come see my home in North Carolina - we even went to pay respects to my father's grave.

examples.sentence: 他还没有学会怎样豁达大度地面对失败。
examples.englishTranslation: He still has not learnt how to graciously accept defeat.

definition: pedantry; stubborn adherance to old rules / ideas

examples.sentence: 简而言之，她的整个音乐风格都是浪漫的：非常个人化，充满明暗，从不迂腐。
examples.englishTranslation: Simply said, her musical style was romantic: intensely personal, full of colour and darkness, and was never pedantic.

examples.sentence: 他们逐渐失去支持。
examples.englishTranslation: They slowly lost support.

examples.sentence: 运用新技术是我们策略的关键。
examples.englishTranslation: Making use of technology is core to our strategy.

examples.sentence: 一丝疑惑困扰着她。
examples.englishTranslation: She felt a sense of doubt.

examples.sentence: 最后老师讲了答案，我还是一头雾水。
examples.englishTranslation: In the end, the teacher shared the answer but I was still confused.

examples.sentence: 触摸同性时男人比女人要更加拘谨。
examples.englishTranslation: Guys feel more uncomfortable touching each other than girls do.

examples.sentence: 我认为当今出版的很多诗歌都是故弄玄虚的无病呻吟。
examples.englishTranslation: I feel that poetry published in recent times tends to be deliberately confusing nonsense.

examples.sentence: 他举起双手，做出祈求的姿势。
examples.englishTranslation: He raised his arms in a prayer-like posture.

examples.sentence: 几分幽默使她的讲话更为有趣。
examples.englishTranslation: A dash of humour made her speech more interesting.

examples.sentence: 趁我们还有力气，跳起来吧！所以，我们必须居安思危，未雨绸缪。
examples.englishTranslation: Since we still have strength, let's jump! So, we should think of danger in safe times, to take precaution.

examples.sentence: 原本是想用现代场景点缀历史场景。
examples.englishTranslation: The original intention was to embellish some of the historical scenes with modern ones.

examples.sentence: 狂欢节游行场面热烈，蔚为大观。
examples.englishTranslation: The carnival parade was a magnificent spectacle.

examples.sentence: 因为没有充分地征求他们的意见，他们感到被怠慢了。
examples.englishTranslation: They felt slighted at the fact that their opinions were not thoroughly considered.

examples.sentence: 她给了我清晰而准确的指示。
examples.englishTranslation: She gave me clear and distinct directions.

examples.sentence: 她因焦虑而面露忧心之色。
examples.englishTranslation: Her anxiousness manifested itself in her expression.

examples.sentence: 我们的祖先孤陋寡闻是否算幸运呢。
examples.englishTranslation: Could our ancestors being ignorant be considered lucky?

examples.sentence: 我们衷心感谢他，并祝愿他前程似锦。
examples.englishTranslation: We sincerely thank him and wish him all the best for the future.

examples.sentence: 卡扎菲就像一个在紧闭窗帘的窗口下殴打妻子的衣冠禽兽，然后，对外界却声称她是失足摔下了楼梯。
examples.englishTranslation: Qaddafi is like that savage husband who likes to beat his wife behind curtained Windows then tell the world she slipped on the stairs.

examples.sentence: 朱莉娅心肠软，见他悲伤动了恻隐之心。
examples.englishTranslation: Julia's soft heart was touched by his grief.

examples.sentence: 他在竞选中脱颖而出获得胜利。
examples.englishTranslation: He emerged victorious in the elections.

examples.sentence: 他只是不知廉耻地剽窃他人的创意。
examples.englishTranslation: He just shamelessly ripped off other people's ideas.

examples.sentence: 莉萨对男朋友肖恩吊儿郎当的态度很恼火。
examples.englishTranslation: Lisa was irritated by the slovenly attitude of her boyfriend Sean.

examples.sentence: 曾有过关于剽窃的指控。
examples.englishTranslation: There were accusations of plagiarism.

examples.sentence: 这场讨论迅速演变成愤怒的争吵。
examples.englishTranslation: The discussion quickly deteriorated into an angry argument.

examples.sentence: 不管我们打什么比赛，他现在都能判断赛场上的各种状况，这比起前几年他在场上魂不守舍的情况简直是判若云泥。
examples.englishTranslation: No matter what play we call, he reads things and sees other things on the court that might not be there when with the play we called, which he would have seen a couple of years ago.

examples.sentence: 他没听到你说的话，他魂不守舍。
examples.englishTranslation: He didn't hear what you said; he's spaced out.

examples.sentence: 乔治也同样喜欢在水坑里蹦跶。
examples.englishTranslation: George likes to jump in muddy puddles, too.

examples.sentence: 在两次专家会谈中，人们已经着手了会议的筹备工作。
examples.englishTranslation: The preparatory work for the conference had been undertaken at two meetings of experts.

examples.sentence: 消防站和救火车都被摧毁了。
examples.englishTranslation: Both the station house and the fire truck were destroyed.

examples.sentence: 他们在电视上看到了警察突击搜捕的激动人心的画面。
examples.englishTranslation: They watched dramatic scenes of the police raid on TV.

examples.sentence: 他死了，但他的灵魂将永存。
examples.englishTranslation: He may be dead, but his spirit lives on forever.

examples.sentence: 他的员工们给了他“嘟囔”的绰号。
examples.englishTranslation: His colleagues gave him the nickname "Mumbles".

examples.sentence: 劫持者已同意再释放十名人质。
examples.englishTranslation: The hijackers agreed to free a further ten hostages.

examples.sentence: 她和她丈夫隐居在他们在巴拿马的农场里。
examples.englishTranslation: She lived in seclusion with her husband on their farm in Panama.

examples.sentence: 他观察敏锐，但言语寥寥。
examples.englishTranslation: He is a keen observer, but says very little.

examples.sentence: 他对讲话做了精练的概括。
examples.englishTranslation: He concisely summarised what he said.

examples.sentence: 仅根据一组结果进行概括是十分不可靠的。
examples.englishTranslation: It's far too risky to generalize from one set of results.

examples.sentence: 吸烟过去在富人中更为普遍。
examples.englishTranslation: Cigarette smoking used to be more common among affluent people.

examples.sentence: 对许多人来说，法国生活方式的精髓要到心脏地带的乡村去寻找。
examples.englishTranslation: For many, the essence of French living is to be found in the rural heartlands.

examples.sentence: 两国篮球运动员在比赛后聚在一起，切磋球艺。
examples.englishTranslation: The two countries' basketball players gathered after the match to compare notes.

examples.sentence: 我住的旅馆也秉承了某些古老的惰性。
examples.englishTranslation: After staying in the hotel, I have absorbed some sort of age-old sluggishness.

examples.sentence: 秉承某人的旨意
examples.englishTranslation: to follow the orders of somebody

examples.sentence: 她在戏剧界赫赫有名。
examples.englishTranslation: She's well known in theatrical circles.

examples.sentence: 报酬将会全额汇寄给你。
examples.englishTranslation: Payment will be remitted to you in full.

examples.sentence: 这些受害人要求全额赔偿。
examples.englishTranslation: The victims expect full compensation.

examples.sentence: 最后一个月的薪水将通过汇寄的方式付给你。
examples.englishTranslation: Your last month's salary will be paid by remittance.

examples.sentence: 我等待时迅速浏览了一下报告。
examples.englishTranslation: I took a quick look at the report while waiting.

examples.sentence: 降低贸易壁垒导致出口商各自为政。
examples.englishTranslation: The lowering of trade barriers has led to a free-for-all among exporters.

examples.sentence: 工资提高刺激通货膨胀。
examples.englishTranslation: Higher salaries helped to fuel inflation.

examples.sentence: 他精神崩溃以后就没能保住工作。
examples.englishTranslation: He was unable to hold down a job after his breakdown.

examples.sentence: 身为精锐突击队的成员，部队会派我们去执行艰难的任务。
examples.englishTranslation: As a member of an elite army hit squad, the army would send us out to do their dirty work for them.

examples.sentence: 礼堂里洋溢着热烈的气氛。
examples.englishTranslation: The auditorium pulsed with excitement.

examples.sentence: 月光下，我只能分辨出物体的轮廓。
examples.englishTranslation: By the light of the moon I could just make out shapes and outlines.

examples.sentence: 他希望那些电子设备得到妥善保存。
examples.englishTranslation: He hoped that the eletrical equipment would be stored away correctly.

examples.sentence: 我对他一直怀有最大的钦佩。
examples.englishTranslation: I have always respected him highly.

examples.sentence: 他渴望对其罪孽的救赎。
examples.englishTranslation: He craves for the redemption of his sins.

examples.sentence: 报春花之类的野花越来越稀罕了。
examples.englishTranslation: Wild flowers such as primroses are becoming rarer.

examples.sentence: 这栋房子地势较高，可以俯瞰全城。
examples.englishTranslation: This house is in a more elevated position; it overlooks the entire city.

examples.sentence: 他为了是否要继续升学而彷徨不已。
examples.englishTranslation: Because of the question of whether to continue his education, he hesitated.

examples.sentence: 他们俩很虔诚，觉得这是上帝赐予的礼物。
examples.englishTranslation: They're both very religious, and feel that this is a gift from God.

examples.sentence: 她的行动是出于虔诚的宗教信仰。
examples.englishTranslation: She was motivated by deep religious conviction.

examples.sentence: 警方预料比赛后会有骚乱。
examples.englishTranslation: The police predicted that there would be trouble (or a riot) after the match.

examples.sentence: 做事要循序渐进！这是成功的最佳途径。
examples.englishTranslation: You should do things slowly! This is the best method to succeed.

examples.sentence: 进入新闻界的最佳途径是什么？
examples.englishTranslation: What's the best way to get into journalism?

examples.sentence: 他再也坐不住了，心里跃跃欲试。
examples.englishTranslation: He could hardly sit still; he was itching to go.

examples.sentence: 她从来没有这么鬼迷心窍过。
examples.englishTranslation: She has never been so obsessed.

examples.sentence: 必须采取新的行动来打破僵局。
examples.englishTranslation: A new strategy has to be created to break the stalemate.

examples.sentence: 我问过她这件事，但她一味搪塞。
examples.englishTranslation: I've tried to ask her about this before, but she always dodges my questions.

examples.sentence: 鉴别坠机(zhuì jī)意外伤亡者的工作费时而且困难重重。
examples.englishTranslation: The identification of the air crash victims was a long and arduous task.

examples.sentence: 我们公司有口皆碑且信用可靠。
examples.englishTranslation: Our company is well-established and reliable.

examples.sentence: 公共汽车频繁地来往于市区与机场之间。
examples.englishTranslation: Buses run frequently between the city and the airport.

examples.sentence: 我听得见他在厨房里瞎折腾。
examples.englishTranslation: I could hear him bumbling about in the kitchen.

examples.sentence: 这个教会的灵魂得救的训诫已经改变了很多人的一生。
examples.englishTranslation: This (Christian) church's message of salvation has already changed a lot of peoples' lives

examples.sentence: 这种孩子气的行为你该收敛了。
examples.englishTranslation: It's time for you stop this childish behaviour.

examples.sentence: 把动物关在狭小的空间里是残酷的。
examples.englishTranslation: Keeping animals in small, confined spaces is cruel.

examples.sentence: 这是开源的一个不可小觑的益处。
examples.englishTranslation: This is one of the not-to-be underestimated benefits of open source.

examples.sentence: 撒哈拉沙漠提供的这种轻便的户外厕所为你解了燃眉之急。
examples.englishTranslation: The Sahara Desert provides this handy outdoor toilet for you to solve your "pressing issue".

examples.sentence: 我们认为处理这事应该非常谨慎。
examples.englishTranslation: We think that we should cautiously approach this problem.

examples.sentence: 一夜之间，流言蜚语开始变成头条新闻了。
examples.englishTranslation: Overnight, the gossip begins to convert into headlines.

definition: to put the cart before the horse; have the order reversed

examples.sentence: 没有房子先置家具真是本末倒置。
examples.englishTranslation: Buying furniture before getting a house is really like putting the cart before the horse.

examples.sentence: 石家庄的历史源远流长，文化积淀深厚。
examples.englishTranslation: Shijiazhuang has a long history and profound cultural background.

examples.sentence: 那个墨西哥女孩已发现了工厂里的诡异活动。
examples.englishTranslation: The Mexican girl had found out about the goings-on in the factory.

examples.sentence: 与户外的湿热相比，屋里真是凉爽惬意。
examples.englishTranslation: It was pleasantly cool in the house after the sticky heat outside.

examples.sentence: 他们喜欢保证客人们都舒适、惬意。
examples.englishTranslation: They like to make sure their guests are comfortable and cosy.

examples.sentence: 即使当你长大，也不要隐匿于沉默之中。
examples.englishTranslation: Even when you're older, don't hide behind silence.

examples.sentence: 他的最新专辑有各种格式可以买到。
examples.englishTranslation: His latest album is available on many different formats.

examples.sentence: 你所要做的就是咀嚼、吞咽和付账。
examples.englishTranslation: All you had to do was chew, swallow and pay.

examples.sentence: 我们住在海滨一座小巧玲珑的旅馆里。
examples.englishTranslation: We stayed in an exquisite, dainty little hotel on the seaside.

examples.sentence: 别忘了，心理与情绪方面的健康，比起窈窕身材更重要。
examples.englishTranslation: Do not forget, psychological and emotional health is more important than the need to be pretty.

examples.sentence: 乌云铺开 (pū kai)，遮蔽了整个天空。
examples.englishTranslation: The clouds had spread and covered the entire sky.

examples.sentence: 我想你的哑谜游戏已经被大家看穿了。
examples.englishTranslation: I think everyone already sees through your charade.

examples.sentence: 给个人投资(tóu zī)者的建议是不要轻举妄动。
examples.englishTranslation: The advice for individual investors is not to act rashly.

examples.sentence: 为了改善环境，我们不能再坐以待毙了。
examples.englishTranslation: To improve the environment, we cannot just sit still and wait for death.

examples.sentence: 墙壁因承受不了重压而坍塌了。
examples.englishTranslation: The wall collapsed under the strain.

examples.sentence: 这种陷阱(xiàn jǐng)不用诱饵或其他引诱物。
examples.englishTranslation: This type of trap uses no bait or other attractant.

examples.sentence: 他说日本将继续贯彻伦敦峰会上确定的方针。
examples.englishTranslation: He said Japan would continue to pursue the policies laid down at the London summit.

examples.sentence: 他们决定搁置双方的分歧。
examples.englishTranslation: They decided to put aside their differences.

examples.sentence: 我们不得不把计划暂时搁置。
examples.englishTranslation: We had to put our plans aside for the time being.

examples.sentence: 这些协会的意识形态构成如今与过去大相径庭。
examples.englishTranslation: The ideological makeup of the unions is now radically different from what it had been.

examples.sentence: 嘲讽这孩子让他感到施虐的快感。
examples.englishTranslation: He took sadistic pleasure in taunting the boy.

examples.sentence: 囚犯们发动了暴乱反抗施虐狂狱警的虐待。
examples.englishTranslation: The prisoners rioted against mistreatment by sadistic guards.

examples.sentence: 龙舟节的起源是为了缅怀屈原的灵魂。
examples.englishTranslation: The origin of the Dragon Boat Festival is to recall the soul of Qu Yuan.

examples.sentence: 桌子装饰着黄金镶嵌的图案。
examples.englishTranslation: The table was decorated with gold inlay.

examples.sentence: 政府应该颁布明确的关于宗教教育内容的指导方针。
examples.englishTranslation: The government should issue clear guidelines on the content of religious education.

examples.sentence: 美国正在往该地区派遣额外的部队。
examples.englishTranslation: The U.S. is sending additional troops to the region.

examples.sentence: 真正的危险是该国东部的民众骚乱。
examples.englishTranslation: The real danger is civil unrest in the east of the country.

examples.sentence: 她沉湎于旅馆豪华奢侈的享乐之中。
examples.englishTranslation: She wallowed in the luxury of the hotel.

examples.sentence: 她那种沉湎于过去的态度不明智。
examples.englishTranslation: It's not healthy the way she clings to the past.

examples.sentence: 海鸥翱翔着，然后俯冲下来。
examples.englishTranslation: The seagulls soared then dived.

examples.sentence: 伟大的心灵总是会遭逢凡夫俗子顽强的抵抗。
examples.englishTranslation: Great minds will always encounter strong resistance from ordinary people.

examples.sentence: 我无意冒犯，那只是贸然随口而说的。
examples.englishTranslation: I didn't mean to offend, it was just a flippant remark.

examples.sentence: 我们好不容易凑齐八名志愿者。
examples.englishTranslation: We managed to scrape together eight volunteers.

examples.sentence: 她在花钱方面总是非常吝啬。
examples.englishTranslation: She's always been stingy with her money.

examples.sentence: 她对服装有着无可挑剔的品味。
examples.englishTranslation: She has impeccable taste in clothes.

examples.sentence: 我在我的公寓里徘徊，记下那些昭示着“单身”的元素。
examples.englishTranslation: I went through my apartment and picked out some elements that cried "bachelor".

examples.sentence: 他给人一种冷酷阴险的感觉。
examples.englishTranslation: He gave off a sinister feeling.

definition: things have come to a close

examples.sentence: 一旦尘埃落定，贝克就为自己的决定进行了辩护。
examples.englishTranslation: Once the dust had settled, Beck began to defend his decision.

definition: to hatch a sinister plot; be up to no good

examples.sentence: 说别人坏话的人一定是自己图谋不轨。
examples.englishTranslation: Anyone who speaks ill of others must have their own ulterior motives.

examples.sentence: 由于某些网站支持匿名用户ID，评论者可能图谋不轨。
examples.englishTranslation: Because some websites support anonymous IDs, the commenters could have their own ulterior motives.

examples.sentence: 他想用该水来灌溉(guàn gài)贫瘠的沙漠土地。
examples.englishTranslation: He wants to use the water to irrigate the barren desert land.

definition: seek temporary relief regardless of the consequences

examples.sentence: 你老是靠喝酒来逃避现实，无异于饮鸩止渴。
examples.englishTranslation: If you always rely on drinking to escape reality, it is tantamount to drinking poison to quench your thirst.

definition: to arrogate; to take or claim something without justification

examples.sentence: 他企图僭越校长的权力。
examples.englishTranslation: He attempted to usurp the principal's authority.

examples.sentence: 这家饭店的餐厅以美味佳肴闻名遐迩。
examples.englishTranslation: This hotel is well-known for its restaurant's delicious food.

examples.sentence: 她脑子里不断琢磨当天发生的事。
examples.englishTranslation: She kept thinking about what had happened that day.

examples.sentence: 手机上搭载的接收器隔三差五地接收广播的信号，以便于延长电池寿命。
examples.englishTranslation: Phones come with receivers that pick up digital broadcast signals, which are usually sent in bursts to conserve battery life.

examples.sentence: 人群和媒体观看将搭载大熊猫的飞机准备离去。
examples.englishTranslation: Crowds of people and media watch as the plane that will carry the giant pandas prepares to leave.

examples.sentence: 她是那个家庭里性格外向的一位；她固执、健谈、热心政治。
examples.englishTranslation: Sue is the extrovert in that family; opinionated, talkative and passionate about politics.

examples.sentence: 为了帮你起步，我们请了 5 位成功作家来揭示一些诀窍。
examples.englishTranslation: To help you guys improve, we invited five successful authors to reveal some tips.

examples.sentence: 没有任何预兆，大地开始震动。
examples.englishTranslation: Without warning, the earth began to shake.

examples.sentence: 他身材高大、爱讽刺人，甚至震慑住了最自信的学生们。
examples.englishTranslation: He was a large and sardonic man, who intimidated even the most confident students.

examples.sentence: 她决心要把自己的新想法付诸实践。
examples.englishTranslation: She's determined to put her new ideas into practice.

examples.sentence: 如果你屡教不改老偷懒，你可能会被活活扔到海里。
examples.englishTranslation: If you continue slacking like this, you could be thrown overboard.

examples.sentence: 你干得很出色，我开始对你寄予厚望。
examples.englishTranslation: You have managed this well; I'm starting to expect great things from you.

examples.sentence: 他稍稍做了个苦相，显然并不指望对他的修辞性设问有所回答。
examples.englishTranslation: He grimaced slightly, obviously expecting no answer to his rhetorical question.

examples.sentence: 去城里待一晚也许有助改变一周工作生活的单调。
examples.englishTranslation: A night on the town may help with a dull working week.

examples.sentence: 他能够努力工作，但偶尔需要督促一下。
examples.englishTranslation: He can work hard, it's just that he needs an occasional nudge.

definition: to turn over to a higher authority

examples.sentence: 丢失物品应上缴这位司机。
examples.englishTranslation: Lost objects should be handed to the driver.

examples.sentence: 就因为我不发牢骚，大家便以为我满意了。
examples.englishTranslation: Just because I don't complain, everyone thinks that I'm satisfied.

examples.sentence: 不能因为没发生什么问题就麻痹大意起来。
examples.englishTranslation: We can't let our guard down just because nothing has happened.

definition: a minor issue takes precedence over a major one

examples.sentence: 我特别喜欢这张画因为很可爱。背景很酷，但是并不喧宾夺主。
examples.englishTranslation: I especially like this drawing, because it is cute. The background is cool, and it doesn't capture the focus too much.

examples.sentence: 他们通常把问题视为挑战和生活经验，并试图凌驾于它们之上。
examples.englishTranslation: He often views problems as challenges and life experiences, and tries his best to stand above them.

examples.sentence: 她面临要谈她丈夫风流韵(yùn)事的耻辱。
examples.englishTranslation: She faced the humiliation of discussing her husband's affair.

examples.sentence: 有些事憋在心里就好，不要拿出来任人宰割。
examples.englishTranslation: There are some things that we should keep to ourselves. Don't bring them up and let people exploit it.

examples.sentence: 我憧憬一个没有剥削和不公的社会。
examples.englishTranslation: I long for a society that is free of exploitation and injustice.

examples.sentence: 岛民们忍受了几个世纪的剥削。
examples.englishTranslation: The islanders endured centuries of exploitation.

definition: to make exceptions in somebody's favour

examples.sentence: 这次碰巧有紧急情况，如果你能通融一下将会很有帮助。
examples.englishTranslation: There happens to be a particular urgency in this case, and it would help if you could bend the rules.

examples.sentence: 恕我冒昧，他的计算有个错误...
examples.englishTranslation: If I may be so bold to make a guess, his calculations were probably incorrect...

examples.sentence: 我冒昧地问一下，迪娜是谁？
examples.englishTranslation: If I may be so bold to ask, who is Dina?

examples.sentence: 这些是稍纵即逝的真实快乐。
examples.englishTranslation: These are the fleeting moments of real joy.

examples.sentence: 机会稍纵即逝，犹豫就是在放弃机会。
examples.englishTranslation: Opportunity fleeting, hesitation is to give up the opportunity.

examples.sentence: 他们正催促我们尽快作出决定。
examples.englishTranslation: They are pressing us to make a quick decision.

examples.sentence: 我不会受人催促草率地做任何事情。
examples.englishTranslation: I'm not going to be rushed into anything.

examples.sentence: 她一直在等着西蒙来破除他们之间的隔阂。
examples.englishTranslation: She had been waiting for Simon to break down the barrier between them.

examples.sentence: 这次展出折射出馆长的决定，即增加人们对博物馆永恒恢弘的收藏品的注意力。
examples.englishTranslation: This exhibition reflects the curator's decision, and also adds to people's impression of the everlasting and magnificent collection.

examples.sentence: 一旦爱上自己，你将能毫无芥蒂地爱上别人。
examples.englishTranslation: Once you love who you are, you will be totally free to love others.

examples.sentence: 很多人认为对鲁莽的司机处理得太宽大了。
examples.englishTranslation: Many people believe reckless drivers are treated too leniently.

examples.sentence: 借助高温和大风，火势迅速蔓延。
examples.englishTranslation: Aided by heat and strong winds, the fire quickly spread.

examples.sentence: 一股迷信的恐惧浪潮在城里人中蔓延。
examples.englishTranslation: A wave of superstitious fear spread among the townspeople.

examples.sentence: 不安全的细菌可能盘踞在表面，会分散到你的食物中去。
examples.englishTranslation: Unsafe bacteria is probably lurking on the surface and could spread to your food.

definition: blot out the sky and cover the sun

examples.sentence: 沙尘暴也常常光顾郑州，漫天的黄沙就像无数只黄虫，遮天蔽日。
examples.englishTranslation: Sandstorms frequently plague Zhengzhou, with sand particles akin to an immeasurable number of yellow insects, blotting out the sky.

examples.sentence: 两名工人在巨型挖掘机的阴影下勘察现场。
examples.englishTranslation: Two workmen survey the site in the shadow of a giant excavator.

examples.sentence: 过去几年经济转坏，贫富悬殊进一步拉阔。
examples.englishTranslation: The gap between rich and poor has widened because of the bad economy in the past few years.

examples.sentence: 一个月以后他们的食物储备消耗殆尽。
examples.englishTranslation: After a month their food supplies gave out.

examples.sentence: 国家财政已经被旱灾和内乱消耗殆尽了。
examples.englishTranslation: The state's finances have been drained by drought and civil disorder.

examples.sentence: 他们遭到监禁并被剥夺了基本权利。
examples.englishTranslation: They were imprisoned and deprived of their basic rights.

examples.sentence: 我学会宽宥过去的错误，还和朋友们密切了联系。
examples.englishTranslation: I learned to forgive past mistakes, and connected more deeply with friends.

examples.sentence: 他的发言非常成功地驳倒了政府的提案。
examples.englishTranslation: His speech did a very effective demolition job on the government's proposals.

examples.sentence: 人们认为核能是一项大事业，但核动力却赋予利欲熏心的人掌握生死的权利。
examples.englishTranslation: The general consensus is that nuclear energy is a big business, but the control over the industry is endowed upon those who are blinded by greed.

examples.sentence: 汽车沿车道缓慢地颠簸行进。
examples.englishTranslation: The car bumped its way slowly down the drive.

definition: to add fuel to the fire

examples.sentence: 公共政策推波助澜了此一阴暗趋势。
examples.englishTranslation: Public policy has contributed to this dismal trend.

examples.sentence: 之前我总是比他迟到，因而我刻意约束自己准时到达那里。
examples.englishTranslation: Previously, I would always be later than him, therefore I made a deliberate effort to reach the place on time.

examples.sentence: 不要被他那迷人的风度所蒙蔽，其实他冷酷无情。
examples.englishTranslation: Don't be taken in by his charm — he's actually ruthless.

examples.sentence: 他迄今申请了十份工作都遭到拒绝。
examples.englishTranslation: He has been turned down for ten jobs so far.

examples.sentence: 迄今为止研究还没有任何定论。
examples.englishTranslation: Research has so far proved inconclusive.

examples.sentence: 但我持反对意见：这种形式的匿名并没有使我免于责任，或者让我可以大放厥词。
examples.englishTranslation: But I'd counter that this form of anonymity does not free me from accountability, or allow me to shoot off at the mouth.

examples.sentence: 这部传记有时混淆了事实和虚构。
examples.englishTranslation: This biography sometimes crosses the borderline between fact and fiction.

examples.sentence: 改名是为了避免和另一家公司混淆。
examples.englishTranslation: The name was changed to avoid confusion with another firm.

examples.sentence: 这个故事的寓意是：一定要听母亲的话！
examples.englishTranslation: And the moral of the story is: always listen to your mother!

examples.sentence: 这间公司对职员的薪水锱铢必较，请个病假也要扣钱。
examples.englishTranslation: This company is very stingy when it comes to employees' salaries; they even deduct from it when you take sick leave!

examples.sentence: 恃强凌弱的家伙欺负更年幼的孩子。
examples.englishTranslation: Bullies like to pick on weaker and younger children.

examples.sentence: 这个男人喝多了啤酒之后就变得爱寻衅滋事。
examples.englishTranslation: The man became belligerent when he drank too much beer.

examples.sentence: 我个人和他以及他的家庭瓜葛很深。
examples.englishTranslation: My personal involvement with him and his family is deep.

examples.sentence: 我不想和这一肮脏勾当有任何瓜葛。
examples.englishTranslation: I want no part in this sordid business.

examples.sentence: 许多动物靠藏匿自己来避害。
examples.englishTranslation: Many animals rely on concealment for protection.

examples.sentence: 在游艇上发现了大量藏匿的毒品。
examples.englishTranslation: A large stash of drugs had been found aboard the yacht.

examples.sentence: 他尝试过用挥金如土的阔绰方式去取悦于她。
examples.englishTranslation: He attempts to woo her in a characteristically extravagant manner.

examples.sentence: 日语的动词放在句尾，把日语翻译成英语有时候有提前揭秘的感觉。
examples.englishTranslation: There is sometimes a demystifying feeling when translating Japanese to English, due to their verbs coming at the end of the sentence.

examples.sentence: 对她获任命为主管一事，人们的反应褒贬不一。
examples.englishTranslation: There has been a mixed reaction to her appointment as director.

examples.sentence: 起草委员会徒劳地通宵工作，想按期完成工作。
examples.englishTranslation: The drafting committee worked through the night in a vain attempt to finish on schedule.

examples.sentence: 他的诚实是毋庸置疑的，你可以相信他。
examples.englishTranslation: His honesty is not in question, you can trust him.

examples.sentence: 为了避免重复，这文件不再赘述。
examples.englishTranslation: To avoid repetition, it's not described in this document.

examples.sentence: 这件弊案所以会发生，就是因为这两人沆瀣一气，暗中勾结，挪用了公款。
examples.englishTranslation: The reason why the fraud happened was because these two people colluded secretly to misappropriate public funds.

examples.sentence: 他们挣扎着从烟雾稀薄的地方逃了出去。
examples.englishTranslation: They fought their way through where the smoke was thinner.

examples.sentence: 司机很可能在开车时昏厥了，导致意外。
examples.englishTranslation: The driver probably fainted while driving, leading to the accident.

examples.sentence: 她顶着他，就像猫在窥伺老鼠。
examples.englishTranslation: She watches him as a cat would watch a mouse.

examples.sentence: 许多年前，那时我自己还是小女孩，我总是惊奇地窥伺着母亲。
examples.englishTranslation: Many years ago when I was still a young child, I would always curiously observe my mother.

definition: pay out of one's own pocket

examples.sentence: 学校资源不多，因此校长要求父母自掏腰包为孩子买新课本。
examples.englishTranslation: The school lack resources, and thus have asked parents to dip into their pockets for new school books for their kids.

definition: overstep boundaries and meddle in others' affairs

examples.sentence: 我只是过来帮点忙，可没有越俎代庖的意思，你别误会！
examples.englishTranslation: Please don't be mistaken, I just came over to help, without any intention of meddling.

examples.sentence: 这家饭馆向胃口很大但囊中羞涩的人供餐。
examples.englishTranslation: This restaurant catered to large appetites and modest purses.

examples.sentence: 我当时囊中羞涩，甚至连一辆二手车都买不起。
examples.englishTranslation: I had so little money then that I couldn't even afford a used car.

examples.sentence: 这警察跟踪着他，就像矫捷的猎手在追踪猎物一样。
examples.englishTranslation: This policeman followed him like hunter stalking his prey.

examples.sentence: 来新加坡旅游，游客们会遇到炎热潮湿的天气状况。
examples.englishTranslation: When coming to Singapore for holiday, visitors can expect hot and humid conditions.

examples.sentence: 年轻人需知满招损，谦受益的道理，不可养成狂妄的习气。
examples.englishTranslation: Young people need to be modest and understand the importance of humility, instead of developing arrogant attitudes.

examples.sentence: 他的好奇心会促使他提出一些刁钻的问题。
examples.englishTranslation: His curiosity causes him to ask some tricky questions.

examples.sentence: 她的活力勃发和她的聪明智慧征服了我。
examples.englishTranslation: Her burst of exuberance and her brightness overwhelmed me.

definition: unable to recover after a setback

examples.sentence: 我们要有愈挫愈勇的精神，千万不可一蹶不振。
examples.englishTranslation: We must embody a more resilient spirit, and avoid giving up no matter what.
